languages.text: "О да". {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво улыбается.{/n} "Точнее, играл, когда у меня был соперник. В основном проигрывал, однако это тот редкий случай, когда поражение не имеет никаких последствий, кроме как возможности стать лучше. И это было очень, очень давно. Если позволишь..."

traits.locale_text: "О да". {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво улыбается.{/n} "Точнее, играл, когда у меня был соперник. В основном проигрывал, однако это тот редкий случай, когда поражение не имеет никаких последствий, кроме как возможности стать лучше. И это было очень, очень давно. Если позволишь..."

languages.text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."
languages.original_text: "О да". {n}Хейнрикс задумчиво улыбается.{/n} "Точнее, играл, когда у меня был соперник. В основном проигрывал, однако это тот редкий случай, когда поражение не имеет никаких последствий, кроме как возможности стать лучше. И это было очень, очень давно. Если позволишь..."

I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

"Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

"Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

"Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

languages.text: “噢，是啊。”{n}海因里希露出了渴求的笑容。{/n}“或者说，我以前还有棋友的时候经常会玩。我一般都会输，但对我而言，弑君棋是少数几件就算输了也不会造成惨重后果的事情，还会让棋艺更加精进。不过，那已经是很久很久以前的事情了。请允许我看一下……”
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，是啊。”{n}海因里希露出了渴求的笑容。{/n}“或者说，我以前还有棋友的时候经常会玩。我一般都会输，但对我而言，弑君棋是少数几件就算输了也不会造成惨重后果的事情，还会让棋艺更加精进。不过，那已经是很久很久以前的事情了。请允许我看一下……”

languages.text: «Ah, sí». {n}Heinrix sonríe, nostálgico.{/n} «Mejor dicho, jugaba cuando tenía un oponente. Solía perder, pero el regicidio es uno de los pocos contextos donde la única consecuencia del fracaso es la oportunidad de mejorar. Pero fue hace mucho, mucho tiempo. Si me disculpa...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, sí». {n}Heinrix sonríe, nostálgico.{/n} «Mejor dicho, jugaba cuando tenía un oponente. Solía perder, pero el regicidio es uno de los pocos contextos donde la única consecuencia del fracaso es la oportunidad de mejorar. Pero fue hace mucho, mucho tiempo. Si me disculpa...».

languages.text: 「ああ、そうだ」{n}ハインリックスは切なげに微笑む。{/n}「むしろ、相手がいたころはよく遊んだものだ。たいていは負けたけど、レジサイドは失敗しても何の影響もない数少ない領域のひとつだからな。それは、とてもとても昔のことだ。よろしければ…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうだ」{n}ハインリックスは切なげに微笑む。{/n}「むしろ、相手がいたころはよく遊んだものだ。たいていは負けたけど、レジサイドは失敗しても何の影響もない数少ない領域のひとつだからな。それは、とてもとても昔のことだ。よろしければ…」

languages.text: « Oh, oui, {n}confirme Heinrix avec un sourire mélancolique.{/n} Enfin, je jouais beaucoup à l'époque où j'avais un adversaire. Je perdais la plupart du temps, mais le régicide est l'un des rares domaines où l'échec n'a aucune conséquence, si ce n'est de vous rendre meilleur. Cela dit, c'était il y a bien longtemps. Si vous me le permettez... »
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, oui, {n}confirme Heinrix avec un sourire mélancolique.{/n} Enfin, je jouais beaucoup à l'époque où j'avais un adversaire. Je perdais la plupart du temps, mais le régicide est l'un des rares domaines où l'échec n'a aucune conséquence, si ce n'est de vous rendre meilleur. Cela dit, c'était il y a bien longtemps. Si vous me le permettez... »

languages.text: "Oh ja." {n}Heinrix lächelt wehmütig.{/n} "Sagen wir mal so, ich habe früher gespielt, als ich noch einen Gegner hatte. Ich habe regelmäßig verloren, aber bei Königsmord hat es keine Konsequenzen, wenn man scheitert. Man kann nur besser werden. Das alles ist aber schon sehr, sehr lange her. Wenn Ihr mir gestattet ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja." {n}Heinrix lächelt wehmütig.{/n} "Sagen wir mal so, ich habe früher gespielt, als ich noch einen Gegner hatte. Ich habe regelmäßig verloren, aber bei Königsmord hat es keine Konsequenzen, wenn man scheitert. Man kann nur besser werden. Das alles ist aber schon sehr, sehr lange her. Wenn Ihr mir gestattet ..."

languages.text: "Ah, evet." {n}Heinrix, efkârla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Daha doğrusu rakip bulabildiğim zamanlarda oynardım. Genellikle kaybederim ama kral katili, daha iyiye gitme şansı hariç başarısızlığın herhangi bir sonuç doğurmadığı nadir şeylerden biridir. Ayrıca uzun, çok uzun zaman önce oynardım. Müsaade edersen..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}Heinrix smiles wistfully.{/n} "Or rather, I used to play back when I had an opponent. I usually lost, but regicide is one of the few domains where failure carries no consequences, except the chance to get better. And it was a very, very long time ago. If you'll permit me..."
